questions.questionText: Which of the following browser supports HTML5 in its latest version?
questions.explanation: Both of the above browsers supports HTML5.

questions.questionText: Which of the following tag automatically focus one particular form field in HTML5?
questions.explanation: This is a simple one-step pattern, easily programmed in JavaScript at the time of document load, automatically focus one particular form field.

questions.questionText: Which of the following is correct about Server Side Events(SSE) in HTML5?

options.text: Using SSE you can push DOM events continously from your web server to the visitor's browser.
The event streaming approach opens a persistent connection to the server, sending data to the client when new information is available, eliminating the need for continuous polling.
Server-sent events standardizes how we stream data from the server to the client.

questions.explanation: All of the above options are correct.

questions.questionText: Which of the following method returns a geolocation object in HTML5?
Which of the following attribute triggers event before the document loads?
questions.explanation: onbeforeonload âˆ’ Triggers event before the document loads.

questions.questionText: _____________is the replacement for cookies in HTML5.
questions.explanation: Local Storage is the replacement for cookies in HTML5.

questions.questionText: Which of the following element may contain not just links but also other interactive items, including the newly introduced command element.
questions.explanation: menu element may contain not just links but also other interactive items, including the newly introduced command element.
Frames feature was already introduced before HTML5.
An article element contains Text or embedded content.
